EmailTemplate.description: STANLIB Manco Offshore Queires auto-response template
EmailTemplate.name: STANLIB Offshore Queries
EmailTemplate.subject: Your case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been created - STANLIB Offshore Queries
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Client,
Thank you for your email.
This is an automatic acknowledgement that we have received your email. Please note this mailbox is exclusively for Offshore queries. We will respond to you within 48 hours.
This mailbox does not accept instructions of a financial nature. Should any transactions be sent to this mailbox, STANLIB will not be held liable for any related financial implication. All offshore instructions must be sent to offshoreinstructions@stanlib.com.
To register for STANLIB online, please click on the link: online portal
To get in touch with our client and broker support team please use the numbers below:
Client Support Line: 0860 123 003 (SA only) Unit Trust Broker line: 0860 104 418 (SA only)
Kind Regards, STANLIB Offshore
{!Case.Email_Thread}
